title: Game Registry Schema
description: Schema for the JSON list of games used by the VortexTricks project.

nexus_domain_name.description: Domain used for Nexus Mods (may be omitted if the game isn't on Nexus).

steamapp_ids.description: One or more Steam App IDs that represent this game.

gog_id.description: GOG ID if the game is distributed via GOG/heroic.

registry_entries.description: Windows registry entries that Vortex should create. Keys are full registry paths; values are the data string.

override_mygames.description: Override value for the 'My Games' folder name in Vortex. If omitted, the game folder name is used.

override_appdata.description: Override value for the AppData folder name in Vortex. If omitted, the game folder name is used.
